law.catch_line: Priority of security interests in letter-of-credit right.
law.text:
The following rules govern priority among conflicting security interests in the same letter-of-credit right:
A security interest held by a secured party having control of the letter-of-credit right under KRS 355.9-107 has priority to the extent of its control over a conflicting security interest held by a secured party that does not have control.
Security interests perfected by control under KRS 355.9-314 rank according to priority in time of obtaining control.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 69, effective July 1, 2001.
